column1: '''''Mallorn'' 34''' is the thirty-fourth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s  journal ''[[Mallorn (journal)
* J.R.R. Tolkien's Genealogies: The Roots of his 'Sub-creation'
* Power, Domination and Egocetricism in Tolkien and Orwell
* The Ballad of Bart and Beth
* Gandalf, Frodo, and Sherlock Holmes; myth and reality compared in the works of Tolkien and Conan Doyle
** By: Gordon Palmer, [[John Ellison]], Ian Collier
